homepage.heading1: Full-stack Javascript/PHP web developer from France & Canada
homepage.intro: I enjoy learning by working on challenging projects. I write concise, legible & maintainable code.
homepage.intro2: I am specialized in Typescript and PHP applications, Docker and generative AI with 5+ years of experience.

TechStack.heading: Technologies I know
TechStack.note: VueJS & Nuxt are very similar to React & NextJS. Although I haven't worked with them directly in production, I am very familliar with the technologies and will easily adapt. I would love to learn more through some challenging projets.

html.name: HTML
html.description: Building websites in plain HTML or as part of PHP or VueJS templates. Strong fundamentals with semantic best practices.

css.name: CSS
css.description: Building websites following CSS best practices to keep stylesheets legible and maintainable.

typescript.name: Typescript & Javascript
typescript.description: Typescript is my go-to language for building interactive experiences on the web. I also have experience with vanilla JS and jQuery. I prefer Typescript when possible as it makes code more maintainable, more robust, easier to debug, understand and cooperate on.

vuejs.name: VueJS
vuejs.description: Built VueJS applications for professional & personal projects. I am also building an open source AI chatbot to answer VueJS questions. I know the framework inside out and love working with it.

nuxt.name: Nuxt
nuxt.description: Built all my recent personal projects with Nuxt, eiher for SEO or for the easier Typescript integration between frontend & backend. My most recent project (VueAI.tools) features self-hosted authentication, database, ORM, AI RAG and more. I also built a toolset mostly based on Docker to easily deploy several Nuxt apps on a single VPS, with reverse-proxy, DevOps & web analytics integrated.

php.name: PHP
php.description: Started my web development career with Wordpress and PHP. From simple static websites to a full-fledged online grocery platform I co-founded (Panier Québécois) with over 800 weekly customers at its peak. I also built Wordpress websites as a freelancer and at the agency I worked at in the last 2 years.

sql.name: SQL
sql.description: Worked with MySQL, SQLite and PostgreSQL either through PHP, Wordpress functions, ExpressJS, Drizzle ORM or directly in a SQL GUI. I have experienced structuring databases, writing queries, transactions, managing migrations and backups.

docker.name: Docker
docker.description: Docker is my go-to tool for deploying applications and building reproducible development environments. I have built applications and devOps pipelines with docker-compose and custom Dockerfiles.

linux.name: Linux
linux.description: Using Linux to deploy applications and recently made the switch to Linux as my main OS. I am comfortable with the command line, bash scripting, package managers and server management. I have experience with Ubuntu, Alpine and Arch Linux.

nodejs.name: NodeJS
nodejs.description: Using NodeJS for VueJS, Nuxt and Express applications. Experience with npm and deploying node in docker containers.

python.name: Python
python.description: Using Python mainly for my AI project. Started with a simple CLI chatbot based on GPT. I have since built an index builder that takes several GitHub documentation sources to build a vector index in Qdrant using Cohere embeddings and LlamaIndex.

llamaindex.name: LlamaIndex
llamaindex.description: LlamaIndex is a TS & Python library to build RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) AI models to answer questions by querying a database of documents to give more accurate and relevant answers. My VueAI.tools AI model is mostly based on LlamaIndex.

wordpress.name: Wordpress
wordpress.description: Started my web development career with Wordpress and PHP. From simple static websites to a full-fledged online grocery platform I co-founded (Panier Québécois) with over 800 weekly customers at its peak. I also built Wordpress websites as a freelancer and at the agency I worked at in the last 2 years.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.description: Experienced with Tailwind and similar utility-class CSS frameworks like PrimeFlex and Bootstrap. Built several professional & personal projects. My favorite way to write CSS as I usually find it easier to come back to a project and understand the styles without having to go back & forth between the HTML and CSS files.

PortfolioProjects.heading: My Portfolio
PortfolioProjects.sub-heading: Find out more about a few of my projects below:
